淲淲淲
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 水, 虎
Связанный персонаж (и): вода, тигр

淲字的基本解释

淲
biāo
〔淲淲〕（水）流动的样子。

淲
hǔ
古同“浒1”。

淲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biāo］
［《廣韻》皮彪切，平幽，並。］
(1)水流貌。参见“淲池”。
(2)浮行。
[②]［hū］
［《集韻》荒胡切，平模，曉。］
水名。即滹沱河。

淲字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淲； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页632第04
【廣韻】皮彪切【集韻】皮虬切，?音瀌。【說文】水流貌。引《詩》淲池北流。○按今《詩》本作滮。　又【集韻】荒胡切，音呼。與滹同。

淲字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
淲字的起名意思

形容流动的样子，也指水边。

淲
Basic explanation of words
淲
biāo
〔淲淲〕(Water) The way it flows.
淲
hǔ
The ancient same "Hu 1".
淲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biāo］
["Guangyun" Pi Biaoqie, quiet, and. ]
(1) Water flow appearance. See "Nongchi".
(2) Floating.
[②]［hū］
["Ji Yun" Barren Hu cut, flat model, Xiao. ]
Water name. Namely Hutuo River.
淲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　淲; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 632 04
[Guang Yun] Pi Biao cut [Ji Yun] Pi Qiu cut,? Yin 瀌. [Said the text] Water flow appearance. Quoting "Poetry" Fei Chi Beiliu. ○According to today's "Poetry", it is written as 滮.　[Jiyun] Barren Hu cuts, sound calls. Same as Hu.
淲

淲
Name meaning
Describing the flowing state, it also refers to the water's edge.
biāo, hū, hǔ
